name: Brink of Extinction
description: Brink of Extinction is a challenging tower defense game set in the ruins of human civilization. Battle swarms of insects over 15 campaign levels and 8 continuous mode levels. At your disposal you have an arsenal of brutal weapons, ranging from machine gun turrets to plasma and rail turrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
